definition[0]: the point at which one area of work, responsibility etc ends and another begins
example[0]: traditional lines of demarcation between medicine and surgery
definition[1]: the process of deciding on or marking the border between two areas of land
example[1]: the exact demarcation of the north-south boundary
definition[2]: when different jobs are given to workers belonging to different trade unions
example[2]: The company is trying to break down the lines of demarcation between skilled trades.
